mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TAG_ITEM (TAG_SEQ,ITEM_SEQ) VALUES ( (SELECT TAG_SEQ FROM TAG WHERE TAG_NAME LIKE #{tagName}), #{itemSeq} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TASTE WHERE FLAG LIKE 'STAR' AND MEMBER_ID LIKE #{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ITEM WHERE ITEM_SEQ NOT IN ( SELECT ITEM_SEQ FROM TASTE WHERE FLAG LIKE 'STAR' AND MEMBER_ID LIKE #{id} )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TASTE (GRADE, FLAG, MEMBER_ID, ITEM_SEQ) VALUES (#{grade} , 'star', #{id}, #{itemSeq})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.avg DESC) as no,A.* FROM (SELECT it.*,im.IMG,ROUND(AVG(t.grade),2) AS avg FROM ITEM it JOIN IMAGE im ON it.ITEM_SEQ like im.ITEM_SEQ JOIN TASTE t ON it.ITEM_SEQ like t.ITEM_SEQ WHERE t.FLAG LIKE 'STAR' GROUP BY it.ITEM_SEQ) A) B WHERE NO <= 20 ORDER BY NO

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.SUM DESC) as no,A.* FROM (SELECT it.*,im.IMG,SUM(t.QUANTITY) AS SUM FROM ITEM it JOIN IMAGE im ON it.ITEM_SEQ like im.ITEM_SEQ JOIN TASTE t ON it.ITEM_SEQ like t.ITEM_SEQ WHERE t.FLAG LIKE 'BUY' GROUP BY it.ITEM_SEQ) A) B WHERE NO <= 20 ORDER BY NO

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.COUNT DESC) as NO, A.* FROM (SELECT it.*,im.IMG,COUNT(t.TASTE_SEQ) AS COUNT FROM ITEM it JOIN IMAGE im ON it.ITEM_SEQ like im.ITEM_SEQ JOIN TASTE t ON it.ITEM_SEQ like t.ITEM_SEQ WHERE t.FLAG LIKE 'COL' AND t.DIR_NAME LIKE 'WISH' GROUP BY it.ITEM_SEQ) A) B WHERE NO <= 20 ORDER BY NO

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.COUNT DESC) as NO,A.* FROM (SELECT IT.ITEM_SEQ, IT.ITEM_NAME, IM.IMG, COUNT(T.TASTE_SEQ) AS COUNT FROM ITEM IT JOIN IMAGE IM ON IM.ITEM_SEQ LIKE IT.ITEM_SEQ JOIN TASTE T ON IT.ITEM_SEQ LIKE T.ITEM_SEQ WHERE T.FLAG LIKE 'COL' AND T.DIR_NAME LIKE 'WISH' AND T.MEMBER_ID IN ( SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM MEMBER WHERE GENDER LIKE #{gender}) GROUP BY IT.ITEM_SEQ) A) B WHERE NO <= 20 ORDER BY NO;

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.COUNT DESC) AS NO,A.* FROM (SELECT IT.ITEM_SEQ, IT.ITEM_NAME, IM.IMG, COUNT(T.TASTE_SEQ) AS COUNT FROM ITEM IT JOIN IMAGE IM ON IM.ITEM_SEQ LIKE IT.ITEM_SEQ JOIN TASTE T ON IT.ITEM_SEQ LIKE T.ITEM_SEQ WHERE T.FLAG LIKE 'COL' AND T.DIR_NAME LIKE 'WISH' AND T.MEMBER_ID IN ( SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM MEMBER WHERE AGE BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}) GROUP BY IT.ITEM_SEQ) A) B WHERE NO <= 20 ORDER BY NO

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER() as no,C.* FROM (SELECT A.*,T.TAG_NAME FROM (SELECT IT.*, IM.IMG,TI.TAG_SEQ,TI.TAG_ITEM_SEQ FROM ITEM IT JOIN IMAGE IM ON IT.ITEM_SEQ LIKE IM.ITEM_SEQ JOIN TAG_ITEM TI ON TI.ITEM_SEQ LIKE IT.ITEM_SEQ ) A JOIN TAG T ON T.TAG_SEQ LIKE A.TAG_SEQ WHERE T.TAG_NAME LIKE #{tag}) C) B WHERE NO <= 20 ORDER BY NO
